title: CONTEST: Are you the lord of memes?
body:
Are you the lord of memes? This could be your moment because we're kicking off a Meme Contest. 

The challenge is to create an original League of Legends meme that will resonate with players and make them laugh. This is your opportunity to showcase your wit and humour! :)

To enter you just need to create your meme and [submit your entry here](http://woobox.com/z24zzy). We'll select the winning memes based on originality, humour and whether the entry follows the [contest rules](https://woobox.com/offers/rules/z24zzy)!

The top 5 winners will receive RP, along with their choice of skin (1) from the list below:
- 1st Place: 3000 RP 
- 2nd Place: 2000 RP 
- 3rd Place: 1500 RP 
- 4th Place: 1000 RP 
- 5th Place: 800 RP

Skins to choose from: Fisherman Fizz, Urfrider Corki, Urf the Nami-tee, Surprise Party Amumu, Order of the Banana Soraka, Definitely Not Udyr or Archduke Nasus.

**Enter here -->** http://woobox.com/z24zzy
Entries close 28th Mar, 11:59PM AEDT.

replies.body: What's a meme.
http://i.imgur.com/oqInBaq.jpg
very well done :)
@Riot can we enter more then once??? will entering agian do anything to our previuos submissons?
Yes, you can enter more than once. All your entries will be considered as long as they follow the contest rules. But you cannot win more than once.
last question :), Say I submitted 2 memes, one got picked for 2nd place and the other 4th. You count the 2nd place (Highest) one for the win right?
Yes, the highest placed entry would be counted of the 2.

Oh and are curse words allowed in the memes or no? The rules say nothing too risque or violent, but are curses which are used otherwise acceptable?

Edit: Something like this http://41.media.tumblr.com/3a3a6d5e0c1e0cea20f0776a59e3171c/tumblr_mjj0pgiRci1s0bxpxo2_1280.jpg or this. http://40.media.tumblr.com/22715ea4b882c70d7bc3fab35124e3f8/tumblr_nhvbo4azXQ1u7ku1eo1_1280.jpg
No curse words. I'll update the rules to reflect that so that it's clearer.

> [{quoted}](name=littlemisscheeky,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=lTYeXvbw,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2016-03-18T12:30:24.365+0000)
>
> No curse words. I'll update the rules to reflect that so that it's clearer.

Okay, thank you for clearing that up. :)

That hat lol
I have actually think of that question when I first statted playing

Do they have to be ONLY League related, or can they reference outer-world things as well (*coughs* trump memes *coughs*)

Also, why no Urf Warwick? You listed all the Urf skins EXCEPT WARWICK.

Yes, as per the contest rules, they have to be League-related. 

The prizes are as described, there's no changing them.

What happens if we do not own a champion but want the skin? Or if you have all the skins for the people out there with them? And will only one person be able to obtain the skin like a check box as to who gets what or can everyone pick fisherman fizz for example?
You also get the champion if you do not already own them. You can choose which skin from the list, regardless of what the other winners choose.

Can't wait to see some of the Dank Memes

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
what d you think about ip gifting??
If you were the original creator, then that shouldn't be a problem.

If the minimum dimensions are 940x788px.
Then is 1280  by 720 ok?
Yes, that's ok :)

THAT 3K RP IS MINE BABY

Whoever judges this has an amazing job.
Someone want to spend 20-30 min of their time to help me make a meme? If I win I'll gift u a mystery skin box or a skin
They can just win the RP themselves...
